title: Pioneering personalized user experiences at StockX with Amazon Personalize
excerpt: This is a guest post by Sam Bean and Nic Roberts II at StockX. In their own words, “StockX is a Detroit startup company revolutionizing ecommerce with a unique Bid/Ask marketplace—our platform models the New York Stock Exchange and treats goods like sneakers and streetwear as high-value, tradable commodities.
